charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C), 846 - Conspiracy to Distribute Heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 46 month term of imprisonment to be served concurrently with the term of imprisonment imposed on Count Two; three year term of supervised released to be served concurrently with the term of supervised release imposed on Count Two; $100 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) - Delivery of a Controlled Substance(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 46 month term of imprisonment to be served concurrently with the term of imprisonment imposed on Count One; three year term of supervised released to be served concurrently with the term of supervised release imposed on Count One; $100 special assessment.
